column1: Subject: Building, Real Estate, Construction and Housing
Table Title: Demand For Construction Materials, Monthly
Data are obtained from suppliers through monthly surveys conducted by Building and Construction Authority and trade statistics published by the Enterprise Singapore.
Net imports plus local production without factoring in stock level.

With the availability of land import data since the implementation of the Importers' Licensing Scheme for essential construction materials on 15 April 2011, the demand figures for granite included the land import volumes since April 2011.
na   not available or not applicable
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified).
